title: RIOT STAFF! please help!
body:
My last game was suddenly end due to the system maintenance. so I cant report this terrible player, but I cant forget his name: -deleted-

I understand if someone toxic just because your play and I can take every judge of my play. but this person... soo nasty! other players asked me am I girl in chatroom before game started, I answered yes. and he said I think MIKA is xxxx cunt! OMG! I didnt say anything and got personal attack? cant believe it! In the game, he just verbal abuse non stoping by using dirty word like whore and for nothing, even I kill or assist. And the most horrible thing, he said one day he will find a girl and kill!! THIS is a game which is have fun or scare me??

I feel really angry and innocent!! im trying to treat every player with respect! why??

If any staff see this, please check my game data and give some punishment to this player!

thank you!

replies.body:
Welcome to league of legnds, were chubby little boys have no girlfriends, so they have to leash out their angry on other peoples because of their failures.  Just mute them and report them and also, have  a nice day.

"You can never be offended if you just don't listen" -Jayboy1773/Deaf kid

Hey man,

Thank you for the report. Please remember there is no naming and shaming on the boards. 

 If you have any evidence in the future, submit the info in a secure ticket so we can help. For Justice!

hi staff

"no naming and shaming"... ... maybe I should apologise abt this, but actually I dont have to. Does that guy know what the meaning of "shame"? I guess he doesnt. For JUSTICE? so you think that I should abused in the game? for justice?

If the game was not down suddenly yesterday, I would never post on board about how that player abuse and insults me in game!! Thats not good! indeed! Im not a mean person, if you have authority to check what did he typed last night, you will be shocked im sure!

THANK you for your "help". staff

Hey Miss Mika,

We will be investigating your report! Its definitely not okay to be abused by someone else and we would never say something like that. But if you want to report someone please do so at the end of the game with our report function (which I know you couldn't) OR send in a support ticket with the evidence that you have.

We have a multiple systems in place to deal with negative behaviour which you can find here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback

Just to re iterate my message before, I apologise for not being clear in it. 

Thank you for your report, we will be investigating. If you have any evidence in the future, submit the info in a secure ticket so we can help faster. For Justice!

Yo try not to let it get to you.. We all come into contact with people like thisd at some point and make your experience really negative.. It's made me quit league several times.. Just try forget about it ey.. Understand that there are people like this. All you can do, really.
People like that are just pathetic, the most you can do is mute, report then block and hope riot will deal with em.
